about.title: About
about.bio: Product Design Engineer and Streaming Specialist with hands-on experience in live support, Python automation, and Grafana monitoring. Master’s in Engineering student (sustainability and software development). I’ve led data and internal tooling projects at Genius Sports, plus work across graphic design, renewable energy research, and interactive experiences. I focus on useful, measurable, and well-designed solutions for users and technical teams.
highlights: Python automation for operations and tooling
Live streaming operations and incident response
UX for internal tools and data pipelines
